}}'''Rob Alexander''' (b. [[15 June]] [[1966]]) is a Canadian fantasy card artist. He illustrated for [[Magic: The Gathering]] and [[Dragon Magazine]]. In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create artwork for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]<ref name=CCGA>{{CCGA|entry=Alexander, Rob}}, pp. 78-79</ref>
